articles.description: OnePlus Buds Z Steven Harrington Edition truly wireless (TWS) earbuds have been launched in India as a limited edition of the regular OnePlus Buds Z. The new earbuds  come in a two-tone purple and mint colour option.
articles.content: OnePlus Buds Z Steven Harrington Edition have been launched by OnePlus in collaboration with Los Angeles-based artist and designer Steven Harrington. The new limited-edition earbuds come in a two-ton… [+2934 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft's New Surface Pro 7 Ad Hits Apple's MacBook Pro Where It Really Hurts - Mashable India
articles.description:
In 2021, Microsoft woke up and chose brutal honesty. 
In its latest ad for the Surface Pro 7 (by way of MS Power User), the company spent 30 seconds listing all the ways it believes the 2-in-1 laptop is better than Apple's MacBook Pro.
